SA19bsa072_u:6: iha khalu prekṣāpūrvakāriṇo 'rthijanāḥ sarvapuruṣārthasiddhinimittaṃ pramāṇamanusarantīti pramāṇamādau vyutpādyate /
SA19bsa072_u:12: yathā sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti jñānasya, marīcikāsu vā jalajñānasya /
SA19bsa072_u:15: tasmādutpannaṃ tadarthaprāpaṇayogyaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇam // pramāṇasya kāryam
SA19bsa072_u:16: nanu jñānaṃ kartṛ puruṣaṃ prayojyamartha karmabhūtaṃ yadi kadācinna prāpayati tatkathamaprāpakatvāt pramāṇaṃ syāt? ucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:17: na hi jñānena puruṣo gale pādukānyāyena balādarthe pravartayitavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:18: api tvevaṃbhūtamidaṃ vatusvarūpaṃ nānyathetyanenākāreṇa niścayo janayitavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:20: puruṣastu tatra prayojanavaśāt pravartatāmṛte prayojanaṃ na pravartatām,
SA19bsa072_u:26: na ca yad dṛṣṭaṃ tatprāpyate, kṣaṇikatvāt kiṃ ca, rūpaṃ dṛṣṭa, prāpyate ca spraṣṭavyam /
SA19bsa072_u:27: tato 'nyad dṛṣṭamanyat prāpyata ityapratītaprāpaṇāt kathaṃ prāmāṇyamasya saṃgacchatām /
SA19bsa072_u:29: yadi nāma vastuto 'nyadeva prāpyate tathāpi dṛṣṭameva mayā prāptamityekatvādhyavasāyāt pratītaprāpaṇamabhidhīyate /
SA19bsa072_u:34: tataśca kathaṃ tatsamyagjñānamiti cet? naiṣa doṣaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:37: tathā hi - yadi nāma mandabuddhirutpattivaśādavisaṃvādakatvaṃ jñānasya nāvadhārayituṃ samarthaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:38: tathāpi dāhapākāvagāhanasnānapānonmajjanāddyarthakriyāṃ dūrato 'nubhavato narasya darśanenoccalad dhūmādidarśanena cāvadhārayati /
SA19bsa072_u:40: yadyavisaṃvādalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tadā śrotrajñānasyādhigatārthāprāpakatvāt kathaṃ prāmāṇyamini cet? na /
SA19bsa072_u:49: yadi nāma tasyaiva nāsti sandeho me vartata iti tathāpi sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvādyuktaḥ sandeho bhavan kena vāryate iti / tasmāt
SA19bsa072_u:52: ata eva tu pratyakṣasya svataḥ prāmāṇyam /
SA19bsa072_u:54: yogijñānasya svasaṃvedanasya ca svata eva prāmāṇyam /
SA19bsa072_u:55: anumānasya tu niścayātmakatvāt svata eva pramāṇyam /
SA19bsa072_u:57: tenāyamarthaḥ- prathamata eva yadvijñānaṃ viṣaye pravṛttaṃ tadeva pramāṇam,
SA19bsa072_u:60: yathā ghaṭaṃ nirvikalpakena jñānena dṛṣṭvā paścāttasminneva viṣaye ghaṭo 'yamiti savikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ smaraṇarūpam,
SA19bsa072_u:61: yathā vā parvatādau dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā vahniratretyanumānajñānānantaraṃ punarapi tatraiva vahniratretyanumānajñānam /
SA19bsa072_u:63: samyagjñānaṃ pramāṇamityukte sāmarthyājjaḍasvabhāvasyendriyādeḥ paricchedakatvābhāvāt prāmāṇyaṃ nirastam paricchedakatvaṃ hi boddhṛtvam /
SA19bsa072_u:71: nanu yadyakṣāśritaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tadā mānasādi vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānatrayamindriyādanutpatteḥ pratyakṣaṃ na syāt?
SA19bsa072_u:74: tataḥ svasaṃvedanādikamapi jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanarūpamartha sākṣātkarotīti pratyakṣaśabdavācyaṃ siddhyatīti //
SA19bsa072_u:79: liṅgagrahaṇaliṅgaliṅgisambandhasmaraṇayoḥ paścāt yadvijñānaṃ parvatādau dharmiṇi parokṣavastvālambakaṃ tadevānumānaśabdenābhidhīyate /
SA19bsa072_u:82: dvividhavacanena ekaṃ trīṇi catvāri pañca ṣaḍhiti vipratipattayo nirasyante /
SA19bsa072_u:83: tathā hi pratyakṣamevaikaṃ pramāṇamiti cārvākaḥ / pratyakṣamanumānaṃ śābdaṃ ceti sāṃkhyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:87: dvividhavacanena dvitve prāpte pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ceti punaryaduktaṃ tadanyathādvitvanirāsārtham /
SA19bsa072_u:88: tathā hi vaiyāka raṇo brūte pratyakṣaṃ śābdaṃ ceti pramāṇadvayam //
SA19bsa072_u:91: tathā hi - sa khalu pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ parapratipādanāya praṇayati /
SA19bsa072_u:97: nānumānaṃ pramāṇamiti ca bruvan kathaṃ nāma nonmattaścārvākaḥ syāt?
SA19bsa072_u:101: na ca śabdānāṃ bāhyārthena saha kaścitsambandho 'sti /
SA19bsa072_u:102: tathā hi - śabdārthayoḥ sambandho bhavan tādātmyaṃ tadutpattirarvā bhavet /
SA19bsa072_u:103: tatra na tāvāttādātmyaṃ śabdārthayoḥ, atyantabhedena pratibhāsanāt /
SA19bsa072_u:108: tathā hi - śabdavyāpāramantareṇa svahetoreva mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍasalilakulālacakrādeḥ sakāśādutpadyamāno ghaṭādirartho dṛśyate /
SA19bsa072_u:110: atha tādātmyatadutpattibhyāmanya eva vācyāvācakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdārthayoḥ vāstavaḥ sambandhadho 'sti /
SA19bsa072_u:112: yogyatā mātreṇaiva pradīpāt ghaṭādipratītivat na caitadasti /
SA19bsa072_u:113: tathā hi - abhinavo nālikeradvīpādāyātaḥ pumānagniśabdaṃ śrutvāpyagniśabdānna kiñcidartha pratyetīti /
SA19bsa072_u:114: atha tāṃstān saṃketānapekṣya tattadarthapratyāyanayogya evāyaṃ śabdo jāyata ityucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:118: tato na jñāyate kiṃ vivakṣitārthamāha, āhosvidanyaṃ veti /
SA19bsa072_u:120: tathā ca so 'pi kena sambandhena tayoḥ sambaddha iti praṣṭavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:121: anyena caturthena sambandheneti cet, caturtho 'pi teṣu kena sambandhena sambaddhaḥ?
SA19bsa072_u:122: pañcamena kenaciccet, so 'pi kenetyanavasthāyāṃ antyāsiddhau pūrveṣāmapyasiddhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:123: athāsambaddha eva śabdārthayoḥ samvandha iti cet /
SA19bsa072_u:125: yo na sambaddhaḥ sa kathaṃ sambandho bhavati ghaṭasyeva paṭaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:126: atha vaktavyaṃ sambandhasya tādṛśa eva svabhāvaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:127: yena sambandhāntaranirapekṣa evaṃ paraṃ sambadhnāti? taduyuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:129: yathāgnerevāyamīdṛśaḥ svabhāvo yaduta dāhakatvaṃ nāma nānyasyākāśādeḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:130: sambandhasiddhau tu pramāṇaṃ kiñcinnirupayanto na paśyāmaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:131: na caivaṃ vaktavyaṃ śabdaśaktisvabhāvādeva śabdānāṃ niyatārthāvyabhicāritvamiti /
SA19bsa072_u:132: tathā hi - yadi ghaṭa ityayaṃ śabdaḥ svabhāvādeva kambugrīvākāraṃ vārisaṃdhāraṇasamartha padārthamabhidadhāti,
SA19bsa072_u:134: na hi śālibījaṃ svahetoraṅkurajananasvabhāvamutpannaṃ saṃketāntamapekṣya gardabhaṃ janayituṃ samartha syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:140: sarāgā api vītarāgā iva ceṣṭanta iti nyāyātkathamāptatvaṃ niścīyatāmiti /
SA19bsa072_u:141: samvandhadūṣaṇena ca vaidikaśabdānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ nirastamiti pṛthaṅnoktam /
SA19bsa072_u:142: kathaṃ tarhi sarvo 'yamasandigdho laukiko vyavahāra iti cet /
SA19bsa072_u:143: tathā tathā saṃketena vivakṣāvaśāditi na kācit kṣatiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:147: yaḥ pratipattā gāṃ jānāti na gavayam, sa ca apadiṣṭaḥ svāminā araṇyaṃ gatvā gavayamānayeti /
SA19bsa072_u:148: sa ca gavayaśabdavācyamarthamajānāno vanecaramanyaṃ tajjñaṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān, kīdṛśo gavaya iti /
SA19bsa072_u:149: sa cāha yādṛśī gaustādṛśo gavaya iti /
SA19bsa072_u:150: tasyāraṇyagatasya preṣyapuruṣasya atideśa vākyārthasmaraṇasahakāri gavayasārūpyajñānaṃ kartṛ ayamasau gavayaśabdavācyo 'rtha iti pratipattiṃ phalasvarūpāṃ janayatpramāṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:153: na cāsya nipuṇamapi nirupayanto viṣayaṃ saṃpaśyāmaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:154: tathā hi - samākhyā nāma sambandhaḥ tasya viṣayo varṇyate /
SA19bsa072_u:158: kiṃ ca - sa hi sambandhaḥ sambadhibhyāṃ bhinno 'bhinno vā /
SA19bsa072_u:159: yadā bhinnastadā tayoḥ sambandhaḥ kena sambandheneti vācyam /
SA19bsa072_u:165: yataḥ sambaddhāvetāviti buddhiḥ svahetubalāt sambaddhavastudvayādapi sambhāvyamānā na sambandhāntaramākṣiptuṃ prabhavati //
SA19bsa072_u:168: tathā hi, sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayastena varṇyate /
SA19bsa072_u:169: na ca sadṛśavastuno 'tiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyate, pramāṇenāpratītatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:170: tathā hi - yadi sadṛśādatiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ dṛśyaṃ syāt tadā dṛśyānulambhagrastametat /
SA19bsa072_u:171: athādṛśyaṃ tadā tatpratibaddhaliṅgābhāvāt anumānādapi kathaṃ tatsiddhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:172: sādṛśyapratyayastu svahetostathotpannena sadṛśavastunāpi kriyamāṇo ghaṭata iti na tatpratyayādapi tatsiddhiryuktā /
SA19bsa072_u:174: yataḥ pramāṇāntarasiddhayoreva sādṛśyapiṇḍaoyoryo viśeṣaṇaviṣeṣyabhāvastasyopamānaviṣayatvaṃ tena vādinā parikalddhapyate /
SA19bsa072_u:178: tathā hi pratyakṣādipratīto yo 'rthaḥ sa yena vinā nopapadyate tasyārthasya kalpanamarthāpattirityarthāpatterlakṣaṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:180_0: tasya yadi parikalpyamānena parokṣārthena saha kaścittādāmyalakṣaṇaḥ tadutpattilakṣaṇo
SA19bsa072_u:180_1: va pratibandho 'sti tadā svabhāvaliṅgajā kāryaliṅgajā vāsau pratipattirityarthāpattiranumānameva /
SA19bsa072_u:185: abhāvasya svarūpameva tāvannopalabhāmahe, kuta eva tasya prāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA19bsa072_u:192: jñānamapi kiṃ jñānamātram ekajñānasaṃsargivastuno jñānaṃ vā?
SA19bsa072_u:194: tasya sarvaśaktiśūnyatvāt paricchedakatvaṃ vā kathaṃ bhavet? ata eva kenāpi na tatpratidyate /
SA19bsa072_u:198: na hi jaḍarūpaṃ śakaṭādikaṃ ghaṭaṃ paricchinattīti kvāpi dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ veti /
SA19bsa072_u:206: yathā vijñapuruṣasya so 'yaṃ ghaṭa iti pratītiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:209: nanu bālamūkādīnāmantarjalpākāraṃ kalpanājñānamastīti kuto niścetavyamiti ceta,
SA19bsa072_u:212: bālamūkādivijñānasya kalpanātva sūcanena bhattoktālocanājñānaṃ savikalpakamiti pratipāditaṃ bhavati /
SA19bsa072_u:213: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ kalpanāvibhramātmakaṃ ca jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na syāditi ceta? na /
SA19bsa072_u:214: arthasvarūpasākṣākāri hi jñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti sarvoṣāṃ prasiddham /
SA19bsa072_u:217: artho hi grāhyatvāt jñānasya kāraṇam / yathoktam -
SA19bsa072_u:218: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti cet grāhyatāṃ viduḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:222: na hi yadantareṇāpi yadbhavati tattasya kāryam, atiprasaṅgāt /
SA19bsa072_u:223: yadi punaḥ kalpanājñānamarthādupajāyeta, tenāpi tadā ghaṭādirartho dṛśyeta /
SA19bsa072_u:224: tataścāndhasyāpi rūpadarśanaprasaṅgaḥ, na cāsti / ata evoktam -
SA19bsa072_u:225: śābdyāṃ buddhāvarthasya pratyakṣa iva pratibhāsābhāvād nāsti kalpanāyā arthasākṣātkāritvam iti //
SA19bsa072_u:227: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte /
SA19bsa072_u:228: anuviddhamiva jñānaṃ sarva śabdena bhāsate // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:230: tathāhi - ghaṭe purovartini uccāryamāṇe tatsamīpavarti bhūtalādijñānamuccāraṇarahitamanubhūyata eva /
SA19bsa072_u:239: etena kāmalinaḥ śukle śaṃkhe pītapratibhāsi jñānaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:244: nanu yadi nāma tajjñānaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ kathaṃ tato vastuprāptiriti cet? na tato vastuprāptiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:247: taccaturvidhaṃ- indriyajñānaṃ mānasaṃ svasaṃdanaṃ yogijñānaṃ ceti /
SA19bsa072_u:258: idaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ yatraiva svānurūpaṃ vikalpaṃ janayati tatraiva pramāṇam,
SA19bsa072_u:268: tato yaduktaṃ pareṇātraḥ 'gṛhītagrāhitvamandhabadhirādyabhāvo yogijñānasyāpi mānasatvaprasaṅgaḥ avyavahāritvaṃ ca' iti /
SA19bsa072_u:272: andhādīnāṃ rūpādiviṣayālambanakamindriyajñānameva nāsti, kutastajjanitaṃ mānasaṃ bhaviṣyati?
SA19bsa072_u:277: avyavahāritvaṃ punarasya dūṣaṇaṃ nopapadyate, sūkṣmakālabhāvitvena pṛthagjanairdurlakṣyatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:282: `dvābhyāṃ bhikṣavo rūpaṃ gṛhyate, cakṣuṣā tadākṛṣṭenamanasā ca' iti //
SA19bsa072_u:285: na kaściddoṣaḥ syādityāgamasyāpi viśuddhiranena pratipāditeti prayojanam //
SA19bsa072_u:290: citte bhāvāḥ caittāḥ, vastuno viśeṣarūpagrāhakā sukhaduḥkhopakṣālakṣaṇāḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:291: teṣāṃ sarvacittacaittānāmātmā saṃvidyate yena rūpeṇa tatsvarūpamātmasvarūpasākṣatkāritvāt svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamabhrāntaṃ cocyate /
SA19bsa072_u:292: atra kecidāhuḥ - na ca cittacaittānāṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ ghaṭate, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
SA19bsa072_u:293: na ca suśikṣito 'pi naṭavaṭuḥ svaskandhamāroḍhuṃ śaknoti /
SA19bsa072_u:295: na hi prajjvalito 'pi vahniskandha ātmānaṃ dahati /
SA19bsa072_u:296: tathā cittacaittamapi kathamātmānaṃ vedayatu vedyavedakabhāvo hi karmakartṛbhāvaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:297: karmakartṛtvaṃ ca loke bhedenaiva prasiddham, vṛkṣasūtradhārayoriva /
SA19bsa072_u:298: atrocyate, na karmakartṛbhāvena vedyavedakatvaṃ jñāne varṇyate /
SA19bsa072_u:300: yathā pradipa ātmānaṃ prakāśayati tathā jñānamapi jaḍapadārthavilakṣaṇaṃ svahetoreva prakāśasvabhāvamupajāyamānaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ vyavasthāpyate / tathā coktam -
SA19bsa072_u:306: na ca cittacaittānāṃ jñānāntareṇa prakāśyatvaṃ yujyate /
SA19bsa072_u:307: tathā hi - na tāvatsamānakālabhāvinā jñānāntareṇa cittacaittaṃ prakāśyata iti ghaṭate,
SA19bsa072_u:311: api ca yadi jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ na syāt,
SA19bsa072_u:314: tathā hi - artho viśeṣyaḥ, jñāta iti viśeṣaṇam, jñāto jñānena viśeṣita iti /
SA19bsa072_u:315: jñānaṃ cetsvayaṃ na bodharūpeṇa pratītaṃ, tatkathaṃ jñānena viśeṣito 'rthaḥ pratīyatām /
SA19bsa072_u:316: na hi daṇḍāgrahaṇe daṇḍino grahaṇaṃ yuktisaṅgatam /
SA19bsa072_u:323: kiṃ tarhi? cakṣurvijñānāsaṃvedane kathaṃ jñāyatāmiti codyamakṣatameva //
SA19bsa072_u:325: yathā ca rūpādiprakāśanyathānupapatyā indriyasiddhiḥ, tathā jñānasyāpi siddhiriti /
SA19bsa072_u:327: na hi kaścidajñāte 'rthe buddhimupalabhate / jñāte tvanumānādavagacchati iti //
SA19bsa072_u:332: prākaṭyasyāpi jñānāt pṛthaktve viṣayarūpatāyāṃ vyaktau jaḍarūpatā, jaḍasya prakāśāyogāt /
SA19bsa072_u:340: parokṣaṃ yadi tat jñānaṃ jñātamityeva tatkutaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:341: parokṣasya svarūpaṃ kastasya lakṣayituṃ kṣamaḥ // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:345: ghaṭo 'yamityanena bāhyamevārtha vikalpayati, na tvātmānam / taduktam -
SA19bsa072_u:350: taduktam - svarūpe sarvamabhrāntaṃ pararūpe viparyayaḥ / iti //
SA19bsa072_u:352: tadā svahetoreva prakāśasvabhāvādutpannāḥ santaḥ prakāśanta iti svīkartavyam //
SA19bsa072_u:366: nanu bhāvanā vikalpaḥ, vikalpaścāvastuviṣayaḥ, tatkathaṃ vastunaḥ sphuṭībhāvo bhavatu /
SA19bsa072_u:371: atrocyate - avastuviṣayo 'pi vikalpo vastvadhyavasyatīti bhāvanāto vastuna evātra sphuṭībhāvaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:372: na ca vikalpa eva nirvikalpakaḥ, kiṃ tu vikalpānnirvikalpakasyodayaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:376: kṣaṇikatvanaiva viśeṣotpattiḥ, na tu nityatvena, nityasyānādheyātiśayatvāt yaduktam -
SA19bsa072_u:377: nityaṃ tamāhurvidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati /
SA19bsa072_u:379: nityavādapi kiṃ tasya kastāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:380: yattu śarīritve sukhaduḥkhayorbhāvādanugrahanigrahāt śarīrī rāgādivirahānmukta śceti vighaṭanamuktaṃ, tadayuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:381: na hi śarīraṃ rāgādihetuḥ, kiṃ tu avidyā /
SA19bsa072_u:388: ātmānaṃ nityaṃ paśyata eva sukhābhikāṅkṣaṇādisukhaheturātmīyaḥ syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:392: satyapi śarīre yadyavidyā na syāt, kuta eva rāgādiyogāḥ?
SA19bsa072_u:393: tasmājjīvaccharīre satyapi avidyāvirahāt sarvasaṅgavirahalakṣaṇā muktirvītarāgāṇāṃ bhavatīti sarvaṃ susthitam /
SA19bsa072_u:396: tasya caturvidhasya pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo boddhavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:400: nanu yadi svalakṣaṇameva pratyakṣasya viṣayo na sāmānyaṃ tadānīṃ dhūmadahanasāmānyayorvyāptiḥ kathaṃ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyatām? nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:402: na tvanyayogavyavacchedena svalakṣaṇameva tasya viṣaya iti /
SA19bsa072_u:406: tatra pratyakṣasya pratibhāsamānaṃ svalakṣaṇam eko grāhyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:408: tacca sāmānyaṃ dvividham, ūrdhvatālakṣaṇaṃ tiryaglakṣaṇaṃ ceti /
SA19bsa072_u:409: tatraikasyāmeva ghaṭādivyaktau sajātīyavyāvṛttāyāmanekakṣaṇasamudāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ ūrdhvatālakṣaṇaṃ sādhanapratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:411: anumānasya tu sāmānyaṃ grāhyaṃ, adhyavaseyastu svalakṣaṇameva /
SA19bsa072_u:412: pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayapratipādane paroktāḥ ṣaṭ padārthā na viṣayā ityuktam yathā - avayavidravyaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:419: tathā hi - ghaṭādau paridṛśyamāne pūrvāparādibhāgaṃ vihāya nānyatkiñcidekamavayavidravyamupalabhāmahe /
SA19bsa072_u:421: bhāgā eva hi bhāsante sanniviṣṭāstathā tathā /
SA19bsa072_u:425: nanu pramitirūpāṃ kriyāṃ phalabhūtāṃ niṣpādayajjñānaṃ pramāṇamiti prasiddham /
SA19bsa072_u:426: tatra kāsau pramitiḥ, yāṃ janajjñānaṃ pramāṇamiti cet?
SA19bsa072_u:427: ucyate - iha nīlāderarthāt jñānaṃ dvirūpamutpadyate nīlākāraṃ, nīlabodhasvabhāvaṃ ca /
SA19bsa072_u:432: etacca vikalpapratyayena bhinnaṃ vyavasthāpyate paramārthatastu nāstyeva bhedaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:438: tadānākāratvena sarvatra viṣaye tulyatvāt vibhāgena viṣayavyavasthā na sidhyati /
SA19bsa072_u:439: yatpunaḥ kecidāhuḥ - pūrvaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ uttaraṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaphalamiti, tanna yuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:440: tathā hi prathamakṣaṇabhāvi tāvajjñānaṃ pramāṇaphalabhūtasya dvitīyajñānasyānutpatteḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:441: phalabhūtajñānotpattau ca pūrvasya kṣaṇikatvena vināśāt kathaṃ ghaṭādiviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati?
SA19bsa072_u:442: nāpi samānakālabhāvi jñānaṃ phalamucitam, upakāryopakārakatvābhāvāt, savyetaragoviṣāṇayoriva /
SA19bsa072_u:450: parvatādau dharmiṇi dhūmādikaṃ dṛṣṭvā yasya pratipattuḥ vahnijñānamutpadyate,
SA19bsa072_u:451: sa eva tena jñānena parokṣamarthaṃ pratipadyate nānya iti svārthānumānamucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:454: trirūpaliṅgapratipādakaṃ vacanaṃ paraṃ pratipādayati jñāpayatīti kṛtvā vacanamapyanumānaśabdenocyate,
SA19bsa072_u:459: rūpatrayayuktālliṅgādanumeye parokṣaviṣaye yad jñānaṃ rpatipatturutpadyate, tat svārthānumānam /
SA19bsa072_u:463: samprati liṅgasya trirūpatvamucyate - anumeye satvameva niścitam /
SA19bsa072_u:464: anumeye parvatādau dharmiṇi liṅgasyāstitvameva niścitaṃ, tadekaṃ rūpaṃ pakṣadharmatāsaṃjñakam /
SA19bsa072_u:469: evakāreṇa pakṣaikadeśāsiddhasya nirāsaḥ, yathā digambaraprayogaḥ - cetanāstaravaḥ svāpāt /
SA19bsa072_u:470: patrasaṅkocalakṣaṇo hi svāpaḥ, sa ca sarveṣu taruṣvasiddhaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:473: satvaśabdātpaścādevakāreṇa asādhāraṇasya nirāsaḥ, yathā- anityaśśabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt ghaṭavat //
SA19bsa072_u:478: sapakṣa eva satvaṃ niścitamityanvayasaṃjñakaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpam /
SA19bsa072_u:479: atra sattvagrahaṇena viruddhasya nirāsaḥ, yathā - śabdo nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt ghaṭavat /
SA19bsa072_u:481: evakāreṇa sādhāraṇasya nirāsaḥ, yathā - nityaśśabdaḥ prameyatvāt ghaṭavat /
SA19bsa072_u:483: tacca sapakṣe ākāśādau vipakṣe ca ghaṭādau sarvatrāstīti sādhāraṇamucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:484: sattvaśabdāt pūrvasminnevakāreṇa sarvasapakṣāvyāpino 'pi prayatnānantarīyakasya hetutvaṃ kathitam /
SA19bsa072_u:486: niścitagrahaṇena sandigdhānvayasya nirāsaḥ, yathā - asarvajño 'yaṃ kaścit vaktṛtvādiṣṭapuru ṣavat /
SA19bsa072_u:487: iṣṭapuruṣe sapakṣe ca vaktṛtvamasarvajñatvena vyāptamavyāptaṃ vā na jñāyate //
SA19bsa072_u:500: vipakṣa eva yo nāsti sa hetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:501: tathā ca prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ sapakṣe 'pi nāsti, tato na hetuḥ syāt, tataḥ pūrva na kṛtamiti /
SA19bsa072_u:504: yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti tatra vaktṛtvamapi nāsti, yathopalakhaṇḍe /
SA19bsa072_u:505: yadi nāma pāṣaṇakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ tathāpi na jñāyate kimavītarāgatvanivṛttyā pāṣaṇakhaṇḍādbaktṛtvaṃ nivṛttaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:513: nanu sapakṣa eva sattyamityukte sāmārthyādevāsapakṣe cāsattvamiti gamyate /
SA19bsa072_u:515: te ca trividha eva vipakṣo bhavatīti manyante /
SA19bsa072_u:516: sādhyābhāvamātraṃ, sādhyādanyaḥ, sādhyena saha viruddhaśca prayoganiyamārthamiti kecit /
SA19bsa072_u:517: anvayaprayogo vyatirekaprayogo vā niyamavānekaḥ prayoktavyo na dvāvapīti /
SA19bsa072_u:521: trīṇi rūpāṇi yeṣāṃ tāni trirūpāṇi trīṇyeva liṅgāni /
SA19bsa072_u:527: tatra kāryaṃ yathā - yatra dhūmastatrāgniryathā mahānase, dhūmaścātreti /
SA19bsa072_u:529: anye tu pratijñāhetudṛṣṭāntopanayanigamanaṃ ceti pañcāvayavaṃ sādhanavākyamāhuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:539: yatra pratijñaiva nāsti tatra pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanaṃ kuto bhaviṣyatīti sarvamāmūlaṃ viśīrṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:544: rūpādau sādhye rasādirekasāmagryadhīnatayā niścīyate, yathā mātuluṅgaphale rasādrūpānumānam /
SA19bsa072_u:552: yathā śālyaṅkure janayitavye śālibījamupādānam, kṣitisalilādi tatra sahakāri /
SA19bsa072_u:555: svabhāvo yathā - svabhāvaḥ svasattāmātrabhāvini sādhyadharme yo heturucyate sa tasya sādhyasya dharmasya svabhāvo boddhavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:562: nanvekatve sādhyasādhanabhāvo na yuktaḥ, pratijñārthaikadeśatvāt? na /
SA19bsa072_u:563: abhede 'pi kaścitpratipattā śiṃśapāvyavahāraṃ kṛtvā tatra vṛkṣavyavahāraṃ prāk kṛtamapi vyāmohāt kiñcidāropya punarna karoti /
SA19bsa072_u:565: tasmādetayoḥ paramārthata ekatve 'pi vikalpabuddhau vyāvṛttisamāśrayeṇa samutpannāyāṃ bhedena pratibhāsanāt sādhyasādhanatvaṃ na virudhyata iti //
SA19bsa072_u:570: ekendriyajñānagrāhyo pradeśādāvupalabhyamāne yadi ghaṭaḥ syāt dṛśya eva bhavediti /
SA19bsa072_u:571: upalambhapratyayāntarasākalyāt dṛśtayā sambhāvitaḥ, na tu dṛśya eva /
SA19bsa072_u:573: sa caikajñānasaṃsargipadārthādekajñānasaṃsargipadārthopalambhādvā niścīyata iti tadubhayaṃ karmakartṛbhāvena paryudāsavṛttyā anupalabdhirucyate,
SA19bsa072_u:575: taddhi svayameva na kiñciditi kathaṃ sādhanaṃ syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:577: tasmānniṣedhyādanyadviśiṣṭameva vastudvayaṃ pradeśaḥ pradeśajñānaṃ vānupalabdhiriti sthitam /
SA19bsa072_u:582_0: tathā hi - kaścinmūḍho rajaḥprabhṛtiṣu sāṃkhyaprasiddheṣu guṇeṣvanupalambhena pravarttitābhāvabyavahāro
SA19bsa072_u:582_1: 'pi punaḥ sarvaṃ sarvatrāstīti svasiddhāntābhyāsāt kvāpi pradeśādau ghaṭānupalambhe
SA19bsa072_u:582_2: satyapi nābhāvavyavahāraṃ karotītyanupalambhena trividho vyavahāraḥ kāryate /
SA19bsa072_u:586: anupalabdhertādātmyatadutpattisambandhanirūpaṇam anupalambhasya karmadharmapakṣe sādhyena saha [sādṛśye] tādātmyalakṣaṇa eva sambandho boddhavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:589: asadvyavahārayogyatvaṃ ca tasya svabhāvaḥ [na kārya] jñānaṃ tu pradeśasya kāryamiti //
SA19bsa072_u:594: yathoktamācāryeṇa - atra dvau vastusādhanau, ekaḥ pratiṣedhahetuḥ iti /
SA19bsa072_u:606: tadā dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ sākṣātprayoktuṃ na śakyata iti kāryānupalabdhyādayaḥ prayujyante /
SA19bsa072_u:611: pratiṣedhyānāṃ hi dhūmakāraṇānāṃ kārya dhūmaḥ, tasyehānupalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:617: pratiṣedhyasy śītasparśasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya viruddho vahniḥ tasya cehopalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:619: antyadaśāprāptameva kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ janayati, na sarvaṃ kāraṇām, tato viśeṣaṇopādānam /
SA19bsa072_u:620: pratiṣedhyānāṃ śītakāraṇānāṃ kāryaṃ śītaṃ, tasya viruddho vahniḥ, tasyehopalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:626: pratiṣedhyasya tuṣārasparśasya vyāpakaṃ śītaṃ, tasya viruddho dahanaviśeṣaḥ tasyehopalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:637: kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhiryathā - na romaharṣādiviśeṣayukta sparśavānayaṃ pradeśo dhūmāditi /
SA19bsa072_u:648: pratiṣedhyasya hi vahneryaḥ svabhāvastasya viruddhaṃ śītam,
SA19bsa072_u:667: ete ca kāryānupalabdhyādayaḥ pañcadaśa prayogāḥ svabhāvānupalabdhisvabhāvā eva pratipattavyāḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:669: tatra svabhāvānupalambhenāsad vyavahārayogyatvaṃ sādhyate, na tvābhāvaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:685: saṃskṛtasya sarvasya kṣaṇika tvasamarthanaṃ ca tatra svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavantaṃ prayogaṃ darśayituṃ sautrāntikamatamāśritya bhagavatā yaduktaṃ -
SA19bsa072_u:688: sametya sambhūya hetupratyayaiḥ kṛtaṃ vastujātaṃ saṃskṛtam /
SA19bsa072_u:691: `sarvaṃ tāvat ghaṭādikaṃ vastu mudgarādisannidhau nāśaṃ gacchat dṛśyate /
SA19bsa072_u:692: tatra yena svarūpeṇa antyāvasthāyāṃ ghaṭādikaṃ vinaśyati taccet svarūpamutpannamātrasya vidyate tadānīmutpādānantarameva tena vinaṣṭavyamiti vyaktamasya kṣaṇikatvam /'
SA19bsa072_u:693: athedṛśa eva svabhāvastasya svahetorjātaḥ, yat kiyantaṃ kālaṃ sthitvā vinaśyatīti /
SA19bsa072_u:694: `evaṃ tarhi mudgarādisannidhāne ca eṣa eva asya svabhava iti punarapyanena tāvantameva kālaṃ sthātavyam,
SA19bsa072_u:696: tasmāt kṣaṇadvayasthāyitvenāpyutpattau prathamakṣaṇavad dvitīyakṣaṇe 'pi kṣaṇadvayasthāyitvāt punaraparaṃ kṣaṇadvayamavatiṣṭheta /
SA19bsa072_u:698: syādetat, sthāvarameva tadvastu svahetorjātam, balena virodhakena mudgarādinā vināśyata iti?
SA19bsa072_u:702: vināśaśca tasya virodhina balena kriyata iti?
SA19bsa072_u:703: na hyetatsambhavati jīvati devadatto maraṇaṃ cāsya bhavatīti /
SA19bsa072_u:704: atha vinaśyati, kathaṃ tarhyavinaśvaraṃ tadvastu svahetorjātam?
SA19bsa072_u:705: na hi mriyate cāmaraṇadharmā ceti yujyate vaktum /
SA19bsa072_u:711: prayogaḥ punarevaṃ kartavyaḥ - yadyat vinaśvarasvarūpaṃ tattadanantarānavasthāyi yathā antyakṣaṇavartighaṭasya svarūpam /
SA19bsa072_u:714: yadi kṣaṇakṣayiṇo bhāvāḥ, kathaṃ tarhi sa evāyamiti pratyabhijñānaṃ syāt? ucyate -
SA19bsa072_u:716: tenākāreṇa vailakṣaṇyasyābhāvād bhāvena cāvyavadhānāt bhede 'pi sa evāyamityabhedādhyavasāyapratyayaḥ pṛthagjanānāṃ prasūyate /
SA19bsa072_u:717: atyantabhinneṣvapi ca lūnapunarjātakuśakeśādiṣvapi dṛṣṭa eva sa evāyamiti pratyayaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:719: tasmātsarva saṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikamiti siddhamevaitat nirviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvahetorayaṃ prayoga iti //
SA19bsa072_u:720: tathāparo 'pi nirviśeṣaṇaprayogaḥ - yatsat tatsarvamanityaṃ, yathā ghaṭaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:723: yadvākyaṃ tatpauruṣeyaṃ, yathā rathyāpuruṣa vākyam / vākyaṃ cedam -
SA19bsa072_u:726: saviśeṣaṇaprayogo yathā - yadyadutpattimat tatsarvamanityaṃ, yathā ghaṭaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:729: yadā saiva vyāvṛttirvyāvṛttyantaravyavacchedena vyatiriktocyate bhāvasyotpattiriti tadā kalpitena bhedena svabhāvabhūtadharmeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvo hetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:731: tathā bhinnaviśeṣaṇasya prayogaḥ - yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ, kṛtakaśca śabdaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:733: yathā cātra citragośabde bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācako 'sti na tathā kṛtakaśabde bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācakaṃ kimapyasti /
SA19bsa072_u:735: ucyate - apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi svabhāvaniṣpattau bhāvaḥ kṛtakaḥ ityucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:736: tatraḥ kṛtakaśabdaḥ paravyāpārasāpekṣaṃ svabhābaṃ prakṛtyaiva vadan bhinnaviśeṣaṇamevāha //
SA19bsa072_u:738: prayuktabhinnaviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvasya prayogaḥ - yaḥ pratyayabhedabhedī sa kṛtakaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:741: pratyayaḥ kāraṇaṃ, tasya bhedastena bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa pratyayabhedabhedī /
SA19bsa072_u:742: kāraṇamahattvena mahattvaṃ kāraṇālpatvenālpatvaṃ yasyetyarthaḥ pratyayabhedabhediśabdasya bhinnaviśeṣaṇavācakasyātra prayuktatvāt prayuktabhinnaviśeṣaṇo 'yam /
SA19bsa072_u:743: svabhāvahetoḥ nānāprabhedadarśanaṃ ca vyāmohanivṛttaye dharmabhedakalpanayāpi svabhāvahetureva prayujyata iti pratipādayitum /
SA19bsa072_u:745: svabhāvahetorvaidharmyavān prayogo yathā - yadyadānantarānavasthāyi na bhavati na tattadā vinaśvararūpaṃ, yathākāśam /
SA19bsa072_u:747: vyatirekaprayoge sādhanābhāvena sādhyābhāvasya vyāptatvāt sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyato bhavatīti boddhavyam /
SA19bsa072_u:748: tathāparo 'pi vaidharmyavān prayogaḥ - yatra kṣaṇikatvaṃ nāsti tatra sattvamapi nāsti,
SA19bsa072_u:751: tathā yatrānityatvaṃ nivṛttaṃ tatrotpattimattvamapi, yathā kūrmaromṇi /
SA19bsa072_u:753: yatrānityatvaṃ nivṛttaṃ tatra kṛtakamapi, yathā śaśaśriṅge /
SA19bsa072_u:755: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ nāsti tatra pratyayabhedabheditvamapi nāsti, yathā gagane /
SA19bsa072_u:758: kāryahetoḥ sādharmyavān prayogo yathā - yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgniḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:760: kāryaheturapi pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ siddha eva kāryakāraṇabhāve sati kāraṇe sādhye prayoktavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:761: vaidharmyaprayogo yathā asatyagnau na bhavatyeva dhūmaḥ yathā - mahāhrade /
SA19bsa072_u:764: anupalabdheḥ sādharmyavan prayogo 'vayavinirākaraṇāya yathā - yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate tattatrāsadvyavahārayogyam,
SA19bsa072_u:768: anupalabdhervaidharmyavān prayogo yathā - yatsadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eva,
SA19bsa072_u:772: sarvatra sādharmyavati sādhanavākye sādhyena sādhanaṃ vyāptam /
SA19bsa072_u:773: baidharmyavati [punaḥ] sādhanavākye sādhanābhāvena sādhyābhāvo vyāpta iti pratipattavyam /
SA19bsa072_u:775: niyatatvakathanaṃ sādhyābhāvasya sādhanābhāve niyatatvakathanaṃ nāma vyāptirabhidhīyate /
SA19bsa072_u:776: tataḥ pramāṇena vyāptisiddhau satyāṃ nedaṃ kvāpi śaṅkanīyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca syāta,
SA19bsa072_u:777: sādhyaṃ ca tatra dharmiṇi na syāditi /
SA19bsa072_u:779: yatra pramāṇena sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptireva na siddhā, tatra śaṅkāprasaro 'nivāryaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:782: ihānyaḥ sarvajño bhagavān bhavatu vā mā bhūt, īśvaraḥ punassarvajñaḥ śakyate sādhayitum /
SA19bsa072_u:783: tathā hi, loke trayaḥ khalu bhāvāḥ kecinniścitakartṛkāḥ, yathā ghaṭādayaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:787: tatra ye dṛśyamānotpattayo vanaspatyādayo ye ca cirotpannā viśvambharādayaḥ te sarve sandigdhakartṛtvena vyavatiṣṭhamānā buddhimatkartṛkāḥ kāryatvāt, ghaṭādivat /
SA19bsa072_u:791: tathāhi - kārya tāvat buddhimataḥ kumbhakārādupajāyamānaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyena mānasa pratyakṣeṇopalabdham /
SA19bsa072_u:792: tadyadi buddhimantareṇāpi syāt tadānīṃ buddhimataḥ sakāśātkadācidapi nopajāyeta /
SA19bsa072_u:794: tasmānnedaṃ kvāpi śaṅkanīyaṃ kāryaṃ ca syāt na buddhimaddhetukamiti /
SA19bsa072_u:795: atredamabhidhīte - sādhanaṃ khalu sarvatra sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhareṇa pramāṇena vyāptau siddhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ gamayediti sarvavādisammatam /
SA19bsa072_u:796: tatra yadi dṛsyaśarīraviśiṣṭena buddhimatā vyāptirgṛhyate tadā tathābhūtasādhyamantareṇāpi jāyamāne tṛṇādau kāryatvasya darśanāt prameyatvādivat sādhāraṇānaikāntiko 'yaṃ hetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:798: na hi vyabhicāraviṣaya eva pakṣo bhavitumarhati-
SA19bsa072_u:801: evaṃ dhūme 'pi vyabhicāro vaktuṃ sulabha eva? tanna /
SA19bsa072_u:802: aśakyārohaṇatvena parvate dahanasya draṣṭumaśakyatvāt yuktaṃ tatra sandigdhaviṣayatvam /
SA19bsa072_u:803: prastute tu dṛśyaśarīraviśiṣṭena buddhimatā vyāptau gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dṛśyānupalambhena buddhimato bādho bhavatīti yuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:804: atha dṛśyaśarīreṇa buddhimanmātreṇa vā vyāptiravagamyate tadā adṛśyasya buddhimanmātrasya vā sādhyasya dṛśyānupalambhena vyatirekāsiddheḥ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttiko 'yaṃ hetuḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:805: sādhyābhāvaprayuktasya sādhānābhāvasya [kāśadāva] siddhatvena vyāpterabhāvāt tathā coktam jñānaśrīmitrapādaiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:819: ato dhūmasya dahanena saha sambandhe bhaviṣyatyupādhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:828: kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ, na sarva, tathā mamāpyanyatvāviśeṣe 'pi kiñcideva
SA19bsa072_u:829: dhūmādikaṃ vastu svābhāvika sambandhena sambaddhaṃ na sarvam' iti /
SA19bsa072_u:831: yathā dhūmākhyaṃ vastu dahanāyattamiti pramāṇasiddhiṃ tathā kiṃ svābhāvikasambandho 'pi pramāṇasiddhaḥ, yenaivamucyate?
SA19bsa072_u:833: kiṃ svato bhūtaḥ, svahetorvā bhūtaḥ ahetuko vā iti trayo vikalpāḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:834: tatra na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣaḥ, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
SA19bsa072_u:837: kiñca sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā dṛṣṭāntamātramastīti na vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:842: tathāhi - na tāvadākāśe sādhyābhāvena sadhanābhāvaḥ pratīyate /
SA19bsa072_u:843: ākāśe hi yathā buddhimatkāraṇanivṛttistathā acetanasyāpi kāraṇasya nivṛttirnāstyeva /
SA19bsa072_u:846: nāpi ghaṭe kāryatvasya buddhimadanvayadarśanādākāśe 'pi buddhimadabhāvādeva kāryatvābhāvo vaktuṃ yujyate,
SA19bsa072_u:847: yasmādanayostādātmyaṃ tadutpattiranyo vā svābhāvikādisambandhaḥ pūrvapramāṇena na prasādhitaḥ syādityuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:850: tathā hi, vipakṣe heturnopalabhyata ityanena tadupalambhakapramāṇa nivṛttirucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:851: pramāṇaṃ ca prameyasya kāryam, 'nākāraṇaṃ viṣaya' iti nyāyāt /
SA19bsa072_u:852: na ca kāryanivṛttau kāraṇanivṛttiryujyate, nirdhūmasyāpi vahnerbhānāt /
SA19bsa072_u:853: yadi punaḥ pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā vyāptā syāt, tadā yuktamevaitat /
SA19bsa072_u:860: `viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣa eva saṃśayo bhavati tato yathādarśanameva śaṅkitumucitam' iti /
SA19bsa072_u:861: atrocyate - nāyaṃ nyāyaḥ sārvatrikaḥ / tathā cābhyupagamyāpi brūmaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:862: tathā hi - [kāryatvadhūmatvayoḥ] tādātmyatadutpattisambandha viyogitvena sādhāraṇena dharmeṇa prameyatvadhūmatvakāryatvādīnāṃ tanmatenāpi sajātīyatvam /
SA19bsa072_u:869: tadidānīṃ svamatenaivānena vādinā niranuyojyānuyogalakṣaṇena nigrahasthānenātmā bādhita ityupekṣaṇiyo 'yaṃ devānāṃ priyaḥ //
SA19bsa072_u:871: nanu yadi dṛśyāgnidhūmasāmānyayoriva dṛśyātmanoreva kāryakāraṇasāmānyayoḥ pratyakṣānulambhato vyāptistadā santānāntarānumānaṃ na syāt,
SA19bsa072_u:875: na caivaṃ vyāvahārikendriyapratyakṣamātrabuddhimanmātraṃ jaṭharacitrasādhāraṇaṃ vahnimātraṃ vā gocaro yujyate,
SA19bsa072_u:877: tasmāt dṛśyenaiva vahninā dhūmasya pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptiriti nyāyaḥ //
SA19bsa072_u:878: kiñca yadi buddhimanmātrapūrvakatvamanena sādhyate, tadā siddhasādhanatādūṣaṇaṃ sādhanasya /
SA19bsa072_u:879: atha eko nityaḥ sarvajña ityādiviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭabuddhimatpūrvakatvaṃ sādhyate,
SA19bsa072_u:880: tadā evaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭena sādhyena saha kāryatvasya sādhanasya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi pramāṇena vyāpterasiddheranaikāntikatvam /
SA19bsa072_u:881: atha sāmānyena vyāptimādāya viśeṣasya pakṣadharmatābalāt siddhirucyate? tanna yuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:882: yena sādhyagatena viśeṣaṇena vinā hetorvṛttirdharmiṇi na ghaṭate,
SA19bsa072_u:884: yathā dhūmāt parvatadeśavṛttitvasya dahanadharmasya, na tu tārṇatvādīnāṃ viśeṣāṇām /
SA19bsa072_u:886: tadvad buddhimato 'pi śarīrādivṛttitvaṃ yadi sidhyati, siddhyatu /
SA19bsa072_u:896: kīṭakādīnāṃ ca hetutvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadapi kathaṃ vāryate?
SA19bsa072_u:898: tasmāt sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptirdṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi pramāṇenāvaśyaṃ darśayitavyeti sthitam /
SA19bsa072_u:904: nanu sādharmyavati sādhanavākye anvaya evoktaḥ na tu vyatirekaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:905: vaidharmyavati ca vyatireka evoktaḥ, na tvanvayaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:906: tatkathamābhyāṃ trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ kathyata iti cet, naiṣa doṣaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:907: yasmāt sādharmyavati ca sādhanavākye, upanyaste sāmarthyādeva vyatireko 'vagamyate /
SA19bsa072_u:908: vyatirekāgṛhītau ca sādhyābhāve 'pi na sādhanābhāva iti viparyayaḥ sambhāvayitavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:912: anvayagṛhītau hi sādhanaṃ ca syāt sādhyaṃ ca na bhavediti viparyayaḥ sambhāvayitavyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:913: evaṃ ca vyatireka eva na bhavet /
SA19bsa072_u:919: tadubhayaṃ sukhāvabodhārtha kathyate - svabhāvahetoḥ sattvalakṣaṇasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiḥ sādhyadharmiṇyeva grahītavyeti kecit /
SA19bsa072_u:923: sattvādanyeṣāṃ svabhāvahetūnāṃ kāryahetūnāmanupalambhahetūnāṃ ca dṛṣṭānta eva vyāptirgrahītavyā /
SA19bsa072_u:924: tatra śiṃśipātvasya vṛkṣatvavyavahāre, sādhye dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptirgrāhyā /
SA19bsa072_u:926: sādhyaviparyayabādhakapramāṇena vā kramayaugapadyanivṛttilakṣaṇena svasaṃvedanasāmarthyasiddhervikalpasiddhervā vastutvāvastutvābhyāṃ sandihyamāne vipakṣe dharmiṇi,
SA19bsa072_u:929: , anupalambhasya tu asadvyavahārayogyatvena saha vyāptiḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva /
SA19bsa072_u:930: , anyeṣāṃ tu svabhāvahetūnāṃ kāryahetūnāṃ vā keṣāñcit, yathāsvabhāvaṃ pramāṇenonnīya grahītavyeti //
SA19bsa072_u:933: sa ca trividhaḥ - asādhāraṇānaikāntikaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikaḥ, sandhigdhavipakṣavyāāvṛttikaśceti /
SA19bsa072_u:936: ayaṃ heturaparajīvaccharīre ātmanā vyāpta iti na niścitaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:937: ghaṭe ca vipakṣe ātmano 'bhāvānnivṛtta iti na niścitaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:938: dharmiṇi tu jīvaccharīre vidyata iti asādhāraṇānaikāntika ucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:939: aparaścāsādhāraṇo yathā - anityaśabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt, ghaṭavat, ākāśavaditi /
SA19bsa072_u:940: sādhāraṇanaikāntiko yathā - nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvāt, ghaṭavat ākāśavat /
SA19bsa072_u:943: sattvasya kṣaṇikatvena saha vyāptiḥ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparpayābhyāṃ grahītavyeti,
SA19bsa072_u:948: tathā hi - yadanekavṛtti tadanekaṃ yathā anekabhājanagataṃ tālapham /
SA19bsa072_u:952: athānekatvaṃ neṣyate, tadānekavṛttitvaṃ ca mā svīkurvīthāḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:953: nanu yadyetat prasaṅgākhyaṃ sādhanaṃ pramāṇa, na bhavati [trairūpyābhāvāt] kathamasyopanyāsa iti,
SA19bsa072_u:956: asyāyamarthaḥ - vyāpyavyāpakayoḥ sambandhe sati yadi vyāpakaṃ neṣyate tadā vyāpyamapi neṣyatām /
SA19bsa072_u:958: vādinā sādhanā upanyaste prativādinā tatra dūṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti nyāyaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:966: vaiyarthyaṃ tu yatropanyasyate tatra sandigdhasādhyadharmakatvaṃ hetorlakṣaṇaṃ hetau na sambhavatīti asiddha ucyate /
SA19bsa072_u:970: na hi hetoḥ sāmarthya nāma hetusvarūpādanyat /
SA19bsa072_u:974: yatra tu dharmiṇi sādhyaṃ sādhayitumārabdhaṃ tasya dharmiṇaḥ pramāṇabādhitve āśrayāsiddhirhetordūṣaṇam /
SA19bsa072_u:976: tadiha bauddhasyātmaiva na siddhaḥ, kiṃ punasasya sarvadeśopalabhyamānaguṇatvaṃ setsyati /
SA19bsa072_u:979: tena ca yadi nāma viśvaṃ vyāptaṃ tadapi yadupabhogāyatanatayā pareṇa parigṛhītaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ tadeva sātmakamabhidhīyata iti /
SA19bsa072_u:984: mānasasyāpyahaṃpratyayasya śarīrādiviṣayatvāt gauro 'haṃ sthūlo 'haṃ gacchāmyahamityādyākāreṇa ahaṃ pratyaya utpadyate yadāha alaṅkārakāraḥ -
SA19bsa072_u:987: na cāsya śarīravyatiriktasya taddharmo gauratvaṃ sthūlatvaṃ vā /
SA19bsa072_u:988: na ca vibhoramūrttasya mūrtadravyānuvidhāyinī gamanakriyā yuktimatī /
SA19bsa072_u:989: na cāyaṃ māṇavake siṃhapratyaya eva bhākto yuktaḥ, skhaladvṛttiprasaṅgāt /
SA19bsa072_u:995: tasya ca sarvathāsiddheḥ, kathaṃ tena vyāptatvaṃ liṅgasya niścīyatām?
SA19bsa072_u:997: yadi bodharūpo nityaśca tadā cakṣurādivaiphalyaprasaṅgo durvāraḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:998: athānityo bodharūpastadājñānasyaivātmeti nāma kṛtam, na vipratipattiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:999: athābodharūpo dṛśyaśca tadānupalambho 'sya sattāṃ na kṣamata iti nirātmasiddhiranavadyā /
SA19bsa072_u:1006: tathā hi - na svalakṣaṇābhyāṃ vyāptirgrahītuṃ śakyā /
SA19bsa072_u:1009: tatra ca yadi sādhanaṃ sādhyena vyāptaṃ na pratīyate tadā sādhanaṃ ca syāt sādhyaṃ ca na syādityanaikāntikameva bhavati //
SA19bsa072_u:1012: tatkathaṃ sādhyasādhanasāmānyābhyāṃ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ pramāṇena gṛhyate? naiṣa doṣaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1013: yato yādṛśaṃ sāmānyaṃ paraiḥ parikalpyate tādṛśaṃ pramāṇena bādhyata iti nābhyupeyate tatsaugataiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1016: yathādhyavasāyaṃ bāhya eva ghaṭādirartha apoha ityabhidhīyate,
SA19bsa072_u:1018: yathāpratibhāsaṃ buddhyākāro vāpohaḥ, apohyate pṛthak kriyate 'smin buddhyākāre vijātīyamiti kṛtvā /
SA19bsa072_u:1019: yathātattvaṃ nivṛttimātraṃ prasajyarūpo vāpohaḥ, apohanamapoha iti kṛtvā /
SA19bsa072_u:1020: nanu yathādhyavasāyaṃ vidhireva, tarhi kevalo visāya ityāgatam /
SA19bsa072_u:1022: yattu gopratītau na gavātmā agavātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam /
SA19bsa072_u:1023: anyāpohapratipattau ca sāmarthyādanyapoḍho gavādirartho 'vadhāryata iti nivṛttyapohavādināṃ matam /
SA19bsa072_u:1024: tanna yuktam, vyavahārakāle prathamaṃ vartamānasyāpi pratītikramādarśanāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1025: na hi vidhiṃ pratipadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati,
SA19bsa072_u:1031_0: yathā nīlotpalasaṃketitendīvaraśabdāt utpalapratītau tatkāla eva nīlamasphuraṇamanivāryaṃ
SA19bsa072_u:1031_1: tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍha eva vastuni saṃketitāt gopratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvāt
SA19bsa072_u:1035: kathaṃ tarhi anyaparihāreṇa pratipattā gavi vartatām /
SA19bsa072_u:1043: kiñca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvātmanā pratipatteḥ vidhiniṣedhayorayogaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1044: tasya hi sadbhāve astīti vyartham, nāstītyasamartham /
SA19bsa072_u:1047: tasmāt paramārthato na svalakṣaṇaṃ śabdairabhidhīyata iti sthitam //
SA19bsa072_u:1048: nanu yathā pratyakṣeṇa ghaṭasvarūpe gṛhīte 'paścāttatraiva kṣaṇikatvādiniścayārtha pramāṇāntaraṃ pravartate,
SA19bsa072_u:1049: tathā vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe pratipādite satvāṃśaniścayārthameva sadādipadaprayogo bhaviṣyatīti cet, na /
SA19bsa072_u:1051: vikalpasya tu svayaṃ niśyātmakatvāt, gṛhīte svarūpe kiṃ pramāṇāntareṇa paraṃ grahītavyamiti //
SA19bsa072_u:1054: anekavyaktisamavetaṃ dṛśyamekaṃ nityaṃ tādṛśasya sattāsādhakaṃ na kiñcitpramāṇāmupalabhāmahe /
SA19bsa072_u:1056: tathā hi - gavādivyaktyanubhavakāle varṇāsaṃsthānādyātmakaṃ vyaktisvarūpamapahāya nānyat kiñcidekamanuyāyi pratyakṣe bhāsate /
SA19bsa072_u:1063: dṛṣṭaṃ cedaṃ sāmarthyaṃ bhedāviśeṣe 'pi kāsāñcideva vyaktīnām /
SA19bsa072_u:1067_0: kiñca sarvagate vijātīyād vyāvṛtte satyapi sāmānye kiṃ bhedāviśeṣe 'pi govyaktiṣveva
SA19bsa072_u:1067_1: samavetaṃ tat sāmānyaṃ tatraiva caikākārāṃ buddhiṃ janayatīti praśne svabhāvenaivetyuttaraṃ parasya /
SA19bsa072_u:1071: yad viśiṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ tad viśeṣaṇagrahaṇanāntarīyakam, yathā daṇḍijñānam /
SA19bsa072_u:1080: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvādijātimān piṇḍa iti parikalpitabhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣya bhāvasyeṣṭatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1085: sāmānyasya niṣedhāya prayogaḥ punarevaṃ kartavyaḥ - yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate tattatra asadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:1087: nopalabhyate copalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sāmānyaṃ paridṛśyamānāsu vyaktiṣviti svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1089: varṇasaṃsthānalakṣaṇaṃ vyaktisvarūpamapahāya dvitīyasyānuyāyino rūpasya nipuṇamapi nirūpyamāṇasya sarvathā darśanābhāvāt,
SA19bsa072_u:1091: jñānaṃ hi svasaṃvedanapramāṇasiddham, na tu cakṣurvijñānagrāhyam /
SA19bsa072_u:1095: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vastu paraparikalpitasāmānyena śūnyamiti sthitam //
SA19bsa072_u:1098: tathā hi - asya jagataḥ karttā bhavan nityo vā bhavedanityo vā /
SA19bsa072_u:1100: nitye karttari samarthe sati sargasthitipralayānāṃ niyamena yaugapadyaprasaṅgāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1101: yena hi svarūpeṇa sthitipralayayoḥ sa karttā tadasya svarūpaṃ sargakāle 'pi sannihitamiti tadaiva sthitipralayau kuryāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1103: na hi nityena sahakāriṇā kadācidapyayaṃ virahitaḥ sadā sannihitatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1109: ucyate - tā apīcchāḥ svasattāmātranibandhanāḥ kiṃ na karotīti sa evāsyopālambhaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1110: atha svarūpeṇa sāmarthye satyapi eṣa eva tasya svabhāvaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:1112: tarhi mātāpi sati vandhyā sā prakṛtyaivaitadapi vaktavyaṃ bhavedbhavatāmiti yatkiñcidetat //
SA19bsa072_u:1116: samartho hi sahakāryapekṣāmanādṛtya balādeva kāryaṃ kuryāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1118: nityasya kramakāritvaniṣedhanam nāpi nityaḥ krameṇa kāryakārīti yuktam, nirapekṣatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1122: etena ātmādīnāmakṣaṇikānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ kṣaṇikānāṃ ca krameṇa kāryakaraṇaṃ pratyuktam /
SA19bsa072_u:1129: janmavināśāvadhipratibhāsaprasaṅgāditi nedaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pūrvāparakālavyāptamarthaṃ kañcidapi grahītumalam /
SA19bsa072_u:1133: na ca prāgavasthamadhunā sākṣātkartavyam, api tu smartavyam /
SA19bsa072_u:1135: atha mataṃ bhavedidaṃ smaraṇaṃ yadidānīntanamavasthānaṃ na sākṣātkuryāt,
SA19bsa072_u:1136: tatsākṣātkaraṇapravaṇaṃ kathamidaṃ smaraṇaṃ nāma? yadāha bhaṭṭaḥ -
SA19bsa072_u:1139: smaraṇagrahaṇasvarūpaṃ tarhi pratyabhijñānaṃ syāt, na tu grahaṇasvarūpameva /
SA19bsa072_u:1142: yena hi svarūpeṇa smaraṇaṃ na tena svarūpeṇa grahaṇamityanunmattena śakyate vaktum /
SA19bsa072_u:1147: prayogaścaivam - yaḥ pratyabhijñāpratyayaḥ sa tattvato naikālambanaḥ, yathā lūnapunarjātatṛṇādiṣu /
SA19bsa072_u:1148: pratyabhijñā pratyayaścāyaṃ tadevedaṃ nīlādīti pratyaya iti viruddhavyāptopalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1150: na ca keśādiṣvapi sāmānyālambanatayā ekālambanatvam keśādivyaktereva pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1151: sāmānye pratyabhijñāyamāne tadevedaṃ keśādīti syāt, na tadevedaṃ keśādīti /
SA19bsa072_u:1154: na ca pratyabhijñānameva tadavasthāpakam, yasyaiva vicāryamāṇatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1156: yadi nityaḥ kartā jagato na kāraṇaṃ, kimasya tarhi kāraṇam?
SA19bsa072_u:1160: karmajaṃ hi jagaduktamaśeṣaṃ karma cittamavadhūya na cāsti // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:1171: saṅkalparuḍhānāṃ caturāryasatyaviṣayākārāṇāṃ dharmiṇāṃ cetoguṇamātrasya ca hetoḥ pratyātmavedyatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1172: na caiṣa viruddhaḥ, sapakṣe kāminyākāre sambhavāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1175: tathā hi - vyāptyadhikaraṇe kāmāturavartini yuvatyākāre sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitacetoguṇāt pūrvamanupalabdhiḥ sphuṭābhatvasya paścādabhyāsasaṃvedanaṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:1176: sphuṭābhasaṃvedanamiti trividhapratyakṣānupalambhasādhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sphuṭapratibhāsābhyāsa sahitacittākārayorityupapannā sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1178: nanvanena sādhanena caturāryasatyākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkaraṇāt caturāryasatyākārasākṣatkārī vivakṣitassarvajñaḥ sidhyati,
SA19bsa072_u:1193: anekabhavaparamparālakṣaṇena dīrghakālena bhāvyasya saṅkalpāruḍhasya sphuṭābhatvaṃ sambhāvyate /
SA19bsa072_u:1195: yaccittaṃ tat cittāntaraṃ pratisandhatte, yathedānīntanaṃ cittam /
SA19bsa072_u:1201: iha pūrvajanmābhyāsāt tapodānādhyayanādau sarvasattvānāmabhyāse pravṛttiriti pravādaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1202: tatastatsiddhaye pramāṇamucyate - yaccittaṃ tat cittāntarapūrvakaṃ yathedānīntanaṃ cittam /
SA19bsa072_u:1213: jñānamevedaṃ sarvaṃ nīlādyākāreṇa pratibhāsate, na bāhyo 'rthaḥ, jaḍasya prakāśāyogāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1217: yadi saṃvedyate nīlaṃ kathaṃ bāhyaṃ taducyate /
SA19bsa072_u:1218: na cetsaṃvedyate nīlaṃ kathaṃ bāhyaṃ taducyate //
SA19bsa072_u:1219: nanu yadi prakāśamānaṃ jñānamevadaṃ, tadāsti bāhyo 'rtha iti kutaḥ?
SA19bsa072_u:1221: na hi sarvatra sarvadā nīlādaya ākārāḥ prakāśante /
SA19bsa072_u:1224: tasmādasti kiñcideṣāṃ samanantarapratyayavyatiriktaṃ yadbalena kvacit kadācit bhavantīti śakyamavasātum /
SA19bsa072_u:1229: tatra na tāvat guṇādayaḥ, dravyaniṣedhenaiva teṣāṃ niṣedhāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1230: na cāsati samavāyini dravye samavāya iti tadduṣaṇamatra nādriyate /
SA19bsa072_u:1231: dravyaṃ ca pṛthivyāpastejovāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti navavidham /
SA19bsa072_u:1250: atha kimākāśaṃ nāma kiñcidvastubhūtamasti? uta nāsti vā? nāstyevaitat /
SA19bsa072_u:1251: yatra hi sapratighaṃ dravyamasti na tatrākāśamavakāśaṃ vā dadāti /
SA19bsa072_u:1252: yatra nāsti tatra tadabhāvādevāvakāśaḥ siddha iti kva vākāśamavakāśaṃ dadyāt?
SA19bsa072_u:1253: [yasmādavakāśapradamākāśaṃ bhaṇyate] tasmāt satyasmin sarvadā sarvathā sarvatrāvakāśaḥ syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1258: taccaikamiti cet samānadeśatvāt sarvaśabdānāṃ vibhāgena śravaṇaṃ na syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1265: yadi punarmano [nityaṃ] syāttadānīmetāni jñānāni na yujyante /
SA19bsa072_u:1270: tatra yo 'vayavī ghaṭādiḥ paramāṇubhidvaryaṇukādi krameṇārabdhaḥ prasiddhaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:1272: yadyavayavī nāsti kathaṃ tarhyayamekatvena pratibhāsata iti cet -
SA19bsa072_u:1276: nanu ko 'yaṃ bhāgapratibhāso nāma? nānādigdeśāvaṣṣṭambhena sañcitaḥ paramāṇupratibhāsa eva /
SA19bsa072_u:1280: tasmādyo 'yaṃ nīlādiprabhāso nānādeśavyāpitvenānubhūyate sa eva sthūlapratibhāsa ityadoṣaḥ ye 'pi tadārambhakāḥ paramāṇavo vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ,
SA19bsa072_u:1286: yo hyasya svabhāvaḥ pūrvaparamāṇupratyāsannaḥ na sa evāparaparamāṇupratyāsanno ghaṭate /
SA19bsa072_u:1288: evaṃ ca sa pūrvaparamāṇusannihitasvabhāvo 'paraparamāṇuṃ pratyāsīdedyadi so 'pi tatra syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1292: athavāyaṃ vicāraḥ, yadetatpratibhāsamānaṃ tadekaṃ tāvanna yuktam, anantaroktavicārāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1294: tathā hi - yadyasau sāṃśaḥ kathaṃ paramāṇuḥ?
SA19bsa072_u:1295: atha niraṃśaḥ tadā saṃyuktāḥ paramāṇāvaḥ sarvātmanā saṃyogāt parasparamabhinnadeśāḥ syuriti sarvaḥ piṇḍaḥ paramāṇumātraṃ syāt,
SA19bsa072_u:1298: `dharottaradakṣiṇottaraparamāṇupratyāsannānāṃ svabhābānāṃ ca bheda iti ṣaḍaṃśataiva paramāṇornyāyabalādāpatati / yadāha -
SA19bsa072_u:1302: na caikāsiddhau anekasyāpi siddhiriti na santi paramāṇavaḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1303: yadi bāhyo 'rtho nāsti kiṃ viṣayastarhyayaṃ pratibhāsaḥ?
SA19bsa072_u:1304: pratibhāsaḥ khalveṣo 'nādivitathavāsanātaḥ pravartamāno nirālambana eva lakṣyate /
SA19bsa072_u:1305: tathā hi - sati viṣaye sālambanatā syāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1307: sa cāyamubhayo 'pyanantarokta bādhakapramāṇa [grāha] grastavigraho na vyomatāmarasamatiśete yathoktam -
SA19bsa072_u:1316: yathaikasmādākāśakeśadarśanāt dvitīyam [jñānaṃ] anālambanācca svapnajñānādaviśiṣṭaṃ vivādāspadībhūtaṃ jāgradvijñānamiti svabhāvahetuḥ //
SA19bsa072_u:1318: yadi bāhyo 'rtho nāsti kiṃ tarhi paramārthasat?
SA19bsa072_u:1328: tatra kecidevamāhuḥ - vijñānamevedaṃ sarva sarvaśarīraviṣayabhāvena prasiddham,
SA19bsa072_u:1329: tacca svasaṃvedanamiti na kasyacit grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ vā /
SA19bsa072_u:1333: anye tu sakalākārakalaṅkānaṅkitaṃ śuddhasphaṭikasaṃkāśaṃ vāstavaṃ vijñānam /
SA19bsa072_u:1335: tasmāt grāhyaṃ nāma nāstyeva grāhyābhāvāt tadapekṣayā yadgrāhakatvaṃ vijñānasya tadapi nāstīti /
SA19bsa072_u:1336: mādhyamikānāṃ tu darśane tadapi vijñānaṃ na paramārthasat, vicārāsahatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1337: svabhāvena hi yuktaṃ pāramārthika mucyate loke /
SA19bsa072_u:1338: na cāsya vicārataḥ kaścitsvabhāvo ghaṭate, eko vāneko vā, pūrvavicārāsahatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1343: yasmādekamanekaṃ vā rūpaṃ teṣu na vidyate' // iti //
SA19bsa072_u:1345: `yadā tu na vikalpasya na cānyasya pramāṇatā /
SA19bsa072_u:1349: prayogaḥ punarevam - yadekānekasvabhāvaṃ na bhavati na tatparamārthasat,
SA19bsa072_u:1351: ekānekasvabhāvaṃ ca na bhavati vijñānamiti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
SA19bsa072_u:1353: sākāre jñāne bahirartha iva ekānesvabhāvāyogyatvasya parisphuṭatvāt /
SA19bsa072_u:1354: yatra hi lokasya bāhyārthavyavahārastadeva sākāravādino jñānam,
SA19bsa072_u:1355: tato yattasya bahirbhāve bādhakaṃ tadevāntarbhāve 'pi bādhakam /
SA19bsa072_u:1357: vijñānātmakānāmayamākāro yadyekaḥ sthūlo yati vānekaḥ paramāṇuśo bhinnaḥ,
SA19bsa072_u:1359: na hi tadvijñāne bahirbhāvanibandhanaṃ dūṣaṇam! yena tadbhāvena bhavet /
SA19bsa072_u:1364: śrīmanmahājagaddalavihārīya mahāpaṇḍita bhikṣumokṣākaraguptaviracitāyāṃ tarkabhāṣāyaṃ parārthānumānaparicchedaḥ tṛtīyaḥ samāptaḥ //
SA19bsa072_u:1368: * yādṛśaṃ pustake dṛṣṭaṃ tādṛśaṃ likhitaṃ mayā /
SA19bsa072_u:1369: yadi śuddhamaśuddhaṃ vā mama doṣo na dīyate //
